Uses of Interface
fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align.InputReader

Packages that use InputReader
fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align   
 

Uses of InputReader in fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align
 

Classes in fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align that implement InputReader
 class SimpleInputReader
          General reader processing alignment in a simple way: simply sends separators (if necessary) to the consumer; any token received from the annotated text must at least be a prefix for the current token in the reference text (possibly ignoring case).
 class TokenIteratorInputReader
          This InputReader reads tokens from an iterator over PositionedText objects.
 class VoidInputReader
          This is a special InputReader which does not read any original input text: it only transmits the data received from the AnnotatedTextReader to the AlignerConsumer.
 

Methods in fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align with parameters of type InputReader
 void AnnotatedTextReader.align(InputReader inputReader, AlignerConsumer alignerConsumer)
          Main alignment process.
 void SimpleTaggedTextReader.closeReader(InputReader inputReader, AlignerConsumer alignerConsumer)
          closes the reader.
 void SimpleTokenByLineReader.closeReader(InputReader inputReader, AlignerConsumer alignerConsumer)
          closes the reader
abstract  void AnnotatedTextReader.closeReader(InputReader inputReader, AlignerConsumer alignerConsumer)
          Called after finishing aligning process.
 void SimpleTaggedTextReader.initReader(InputReader inputReader, AlignerConsumer alignerConsumer)
          Only moves to next token.
 void SimpleTokenByLineReader.initReader(InputReader inputReader, AlignerConsumer alignerConsumer)
           
abstract  void AnnotatedTextReader.initReader(InputReader inputReader, AlignerConsumer alignerConsumer)
          Called before starting aligning process.
 void SimpleTaggedTextReader.processNextToken(InputReader inputReader, AlignerConsumer alignerConsumer)
          Reads a token or annotation, one at a time.
 void SimpleTokenByLineReader.processNextToken(InputReader inputReader, AlignerConsumer alignerConsumer)
          tries to find the first separator in the line, then consider the left part as the token (blanks prefix is removed if necessary) and the right part as the annotation.
abstract  void AnnotatedTextReader.processNextToken(InputReader inputReader, AlignerConsumer alignerConsumer)
          Parses the next token and possibly transmits data (token and/or annotation) to the InputReader.
